SEARCH
Package user

Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Applicant
Direct Known Subclasses:
HDBOfficer
public class Applicant extends User
Represents an Applicant in the BTO Management System.

An Applicant can view and apply for BTO projects, manage their submitted application, and navigate through Applicant-specific menus.

  • Constructor Details

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String name, String nric, int age, MaritalStatus maritalstatus, String password)
      Constructs a new Applicant with personal credentials.
      Parameters:
      name - the applicant's name
      nric - the applicant's NRIC identifier
      age - the applicant's age
      maritalstatus - the applicant's marital status
      password - the applicant's login password

  • Method Details

    • getApplication

      public Application getApplication()
      Retrieves this applicant's current BTO application.
      Returns:
      the Application object, or null if none submitted

    • setApplication

      public void setApplication(Application application)
      Sets or updates this applicant's BTO application.
      Parameters:
      application - the Application to assign to this applicant

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu(BTOManagementSystem btoSys)
      Displays the Applicant menu and handles user interactions.

      Options include changing password, project browsing, application management, enquiry handling, and exit.

      Specified by:
      showMenu in class User
      Parameters:
      btoSys - the BTOManagementSystem instance for delegating actions
